word:
The Spirit of Gain Getting 

     The spirit of gain getting, of making haste to be rich, of this all-absorbing worldliness, is painfully 
                                                                           232
contradictory to our faith and doctrines. Should the Lord most high be pleased to impart His Holy Spirit, and seek to revive His work, how many would be hungering for the heavenly manna, and thirsting for the waters of life? . . .
